title: Sonoma
name: HopMonk Tavern
directions: about a 10 minute walk south of the Square
content: A contemporary beer garden that is part of a local chain (two other locations exist) that was started by Gordon Biersch. Food is just mediocre but the beer is adequate and features HopMonk's own beer (if you like Biersch's beers...) and other regional and international brews. Service is often slow and not always the most attentive but a lot of younger "hip" locals hang out here and they have live music most nights of the week.
